body: IT'S TRICKY! TRICKY! TRICKY! TRICKY! TRICKY!

Lazy translation. "Giri no ane" can mean either "stepsister" or "sister in law" depending on context. "Kare" can mean boyfriend, but it's obvious that here it's used to mean "he"/"him. " 

The chick is married to MC's older brother, making her his sister in law. I don't know how you can translate and typeset this whole thing without realizing that.
For some reason it seems like sister and law and step-sister get used interchangeably in hentai a lot
I pisses me of the fact they're refer to each other as step-siblings, Other than that it's hot

Wait, she wouldnt be a step sister if shes openly dating the dude's older brother, i guess sister-in-law, since she has a ring but calls him boyfriend instead of husband? Is it the translator mistake or am i reading too much into it, either way i agree with the guy below me.
Where is all the lovey dovy incest stuff all we getting lately is the lust driven incest lately
This is really wonky/badly translated? Firstly, she's not a stepsister if she's married to the older brother (the ring. Which is why I question the whole boyfriend thing), she'd be a sister-in-law.
best this is the popular should be
Now if she really is a spider, then this isnt going to end well for him

Fuck this was hot, that body those sexy stockings and her perverted sinister mind...

the cheating wasn't bad since more netori oriented since I never sympathized with the brother getting cheated upon...


Good shit, 8/10
I thought I had cheating in my blacklist...
TH I C C   T H I G H

@below (IcedTree): It's more like a figurative description than actual spiders: the stepsister is a femdom targetting her incestuous younger stepbro and got him ensnared to her will (like a scary spider who preys her target and webs it, never letting it escape).

expected spiders, did not receive spiders.

0/10
